member.name: T:MusicControl.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MusicControl.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MusicControl.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MusicControl.My.Resources.Resources.play
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: M:MusicControl.AudioEndPoints.SetDefaultEndPoint(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the specified device as the default device and/or the default communications device.
member.param: The string Id for the input or output device to set.
Set to True to set this device as the default device.
Set to True to set this device as the default communications device.

member.name: M:MusicControl.AudioEndPoints.GetEndPointNames(MusicControl.AudioEndPoints.EDataFlow)
member.summary: Returns an array of EndPointDeviceInfo classes which contain the information for each device found for the specified types.
member.param: Can be (eRender) to get only output devices, (eCapture) to get only the input devices, or (eAll) to get all input and output devices.
